alert.note: Alert for Culberson; Jeff Davis; Reeves (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 4:21PM CDT until June 07 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Northern Jeff Davis County in southwestern Texas... East central Culberson County in southwestern Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a pair of severe thunderstorm are located 8 miles east of Kent, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Reeves, northern Jeff Davis and east central Culberson Counties. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 182 and 198. Interstate 20 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
